biotools.summary: Script for determining homozygous and heterozygous positions from an alignment using binomial probabilities from a predicted error rate (BiSCaP) and a method to benchmark the accuracy of this and other alignment/SNP-calling methods (cFDR).

bioschemas.name: Biscap and cfdr
bioschemas.summary: Script for determining homozygous and heterozygous positions from an alignment using binomial probabilities from a predicted error rate (BiSCaP) and a method to benchmark the accuracy of this and other alignment/SNP-calling methods (cFDR).
